backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the AstCloud pet memorial app, defining types for user profiles, animals, and orders, with role-based access control, order management, user profile CRUD, and Stripe payment integration via HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (heart/hexagon/square resin memorial image generation and ShapeShowcases rendering updates) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering components, hooks, styles, and pages for the Furever Keepsakes and Memorials app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including colors for background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'Furever Keepsakes and Memorials - Pet Memorials' and mounting the app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for the main page, payment success/failure, and renders a profile setup modal for newly authenticated users alongside the main page layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Marketing footer component displaying the 'Furever Keepsakes and Memorials' brand, smooth-scroll quick links, contact blurb, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Sticky site header with logo, smooth-scroll nav links, and a login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication. Supports both desktop and mobile (hamburger) layouts.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Marketing section explaining the three key features of the resin memorials: crystal-clear resin, natural botanical elements, and printed photographs.
Landing hero section with headline, tagline, description, CTA buttons to scroll to designs or process, and a featured product image.
Four-step process section describing how each resin memorial is made, from photo selection through professional printing, placement, and resin curing.
Design showcase section displaying three available memorial shapes (square, heart, hexagon) with example images, pet names, and descriptions.
Order form section that collects pet name, birth/death dates, a photo upload (with preview and progress), and payment method, then submits the order via a mutation hook requiring Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/payment/PaymentF: Payment failure page that informs the user no charge was made and provides buttons to retry or return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/payment/PaymentM: Renders a radio group UI for selecting a payment method (Stripe, PayPal, or Crypto) with icons and descriptions, calling an onChange callback when the selection changes.
frontend/src/components/payment/PaymentS: Displays a floating alert and dialog form for admins to configure Stripe by entering a secret key and allowed countries, only shown when Stripe is not yet configured.
A full-page success screen shown after a completed payment, displaying a confirmation message and a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context and custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile management, order submission, Stripe configuration, admin checks, and Stripe checkout session creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a warm neutral CSS custom property color palette for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with React Query's QueryClientProvider and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (using oklch variables), fonts, border radii, shadows, and accordion animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for a pet memorial website (Furever Keepsakes and Memorials), recording existing features, new feature requests, image requirements, and architectural notes for resin memorial product pages.
